captions.text:
B.A.P came back with the 
second mini album 'One Shot'

We came back with a 
choreography that is more manly

We will teach you 
the choreography

so that you can 
learn it easily

We will show 'Float like 
a butterfly,sting like a bee'

You will know the roots of 
the name soon

Let's...show..it 
for the first time

It's until here, and I'll
explain from the start

At first, extend your arms and 
then fold it then extend it again.

Here. You give more 
impact here, one two!

You stop there 
and then...

One, two, three 
and four!

One,two,three
and four

At this part the butterfly
flies

The butterfly 
flew
Two,three and four

At this point you are 
stinging like a bee

You understood,right?
I think you did

We will show with music,
music Q!

The next choreography 
is 'Push-up dance'

Why is it named 
'push up dance'

It looks like you are 
doing a push up.

That's why probably
it's named that

Should we show them?
-Two,three and four!

At last part you finish it
with it gun shooting pose

Let's show it with music.
-Music Q!

The 'flower bud' dance
is very easy

We will explain with the 
music beat

One two 
three four!

Oh, it's really 
simple right?

This is the part where 
he is falling

You need to be careful when
you do this since it's dangerous

The point is going down with 
arms to make the shock smaller

Let's do it with music.
-Music Q!

title: Let's Dance: B.A.P_ONE SHOT(원 샷) [ENG/CHN SUB]
